name: RestorArt: Fairwood Hills Collector's Edition
description:
RestorArt: Fairwood Hills is an enchanting art restoration journey in the tranquil town of Fairwood Hills. Entrusted by the town with their beloved yet impaired artworks, from scorched natural scenes captured in photographs to fragmented paintings, your mission is to revive these artifacts to their former splendor.

RestorArt: Fairwood Hills veers from the traditional path of jigsaw puzzles by offering a distinctive gameplay twist. Players are tasked with matching unique pieces on a canvas, enhancing both the challenge and engagement of the game.

Key Features:
  • Five innovative game modes
  • More than 90 carefully crafted levels
  • Collector's Edition content: 24 bonus levels, music player, certificates, and more...

This game seamlessly marries the tranquility of puzzle-solving with the joy of art restoration. Each mode introduces a fresh challenge, from piecing together the intricate details that restore the artwork's original allure to assembling a collection of beautiful stickers.
